Title: Margarita, Armando y su padre
Writer: Enrique Jardiel Poncela (play), Enrique Jardiel Poncela (screenplay), Francisco Múgica
Actors: Florencio Parravicini, Mecha Ortiz, Ernesto Raquén, María Santos
Plot: A light's life woman (Margarita), a romantic man (Armand) and a father who allows his son to choose his partner freely, produce a revival of the famous novel treating its characters in an ironical way.
